attributes.action: withdraw subsidised bars and meals from the House of Common
attributes.additional_details: Withdraw the perks that mp's have by virtue of the subsidies in the bars in the House of Commons. Withdraw the subsidied dinning that is available for MP's.  MP's are well remuerated for what they do, and should pay in full for food and alcohol in the House of Commons. They have more than enough perks, and should not enjoy these subsidies.
